name: Rewrite (beagleknight, Marcnowar, sbareas, nuria)
description:
In fiction books is usual to see Davids beating Goliaths... but wait... Goliath has a family too, and a BFF, and he also want a raise... so fight for every Goliath beaten in books! Fight for his rights and join the evil forces! Fight for a better end and Rewrite book endings!

Evil forces also want a better tomorrow!!!


Controls:
Arrows: Move.
Space bar: Jump and double jump.
Z: Pick up words.
X: Use words.

Team:
Shiba Fútbol Club

Credits:
Level music by https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/8-bit-arcade4/
Game over music by https://opengameart.org/users/t4ngr4m
Victory music by https://www.zapsplat.com/author/little-robot-sound-factory/
Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
